extendedInfo.description: This free ERCOT Energy Saver application is the easiest way to help Texans learn about electricity usage and conservation. Energy Saver brings real-time power grid conditions from the Electric Reliability Council of Texas (ERCOT) region straight to your Android device! You can:â¢ Receive real-time grid conditions and conservation alerts.â¢ View real-time wholesale prices.â¢ View ERCOT press releases and informational updates.â¢ View charts showing hourly and real-time demand and generation.â¢ View Conservation Tips for appliance use, hot- and cold-weather practices and overall weatherization. â¢ View helpful information about the ERCOT region.

reviews.title: Nice update with useful graphs
reviews.comment: New version has some nice improvements, including useful graphs.    Hoping I don\'t get a lot of alerts due to poor grid conditions this summer.
reviews.author: Mike James

reviews.title: Good for saving energy
reviews.comment: In my opinion now download this app all the time about it you\'ll see once a manager
reviews.author: billy naylor

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Increase size of graph to take advantage of tablet screen size.  Display actual numbers the graph displays.
reviews.author: Ronald Fisher

reviews.title: Good start.
reviews.comment: Decent. I would like it better if it didn\'t prompt me for push notification so much. Also, would be nice to be able to see current wind supply, like at the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWARENESS!!
reviews.comment: Keeps you aware of just how much energy we all use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wiw. This app sets a new standard.  Exciting.
reviews.author: Bruce Gardner

reviews.comment: It really tells you alot about how much electricity we are using it also sends reminders and notify when we have the high and the low point of the day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too small & Not optimized for tablet
reviews.comment: This is just a screenshot of ercot\'s webpage.  The problem is that the graph is too small and you cant zoom in.  Plus, it is not optimized for a tablet or amythimg other than a very small.screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Needs to tell me when to buy and sell bal day
reviews.author: A Google User
